name: Amber Catalyst

refinement_effect.refine_one: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 7.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 10.5% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

description: A catalyst carved out of amber that gains a warm halo under the sun.
